channel.title: Need shop help!
channel.description:
hi when ever i add a shop either no1 else but me can see them or the people that can see them say there seeing a cannon base ?? and earlier this morning when i logged on in my skillcape store i saw the cannon bases instead of the skillcapes checked the shops.cfg and the wanneshop in the client.java and ive defo got the right codes for the skillcapes and definatly the right shop and description. please help cause i wont turn my server back on until i can fix this.
thanks korey

item.title: Need shop help!
item.dc:creator: @Phineas Phineas
item.description:
@Phineas wrote:

Fatal Desire:

Make sure there on your client…?

It is probably a client-sided issue, so basically what Fatal said, check to see if the shop you added is known by your client.
It’s like weapons for example your server could have billions of customs, but if its not known by the client they will be nulls.
Or some other random crap.

Read full topic
